hook 7mm safety eyes 1 pair x 4 o 8 scissors b x _ o e b stitches and abbreviations o e l o h l c h _ c us terminology e e h h t t round = round m k a o single_crochet = single_crochet r o g b a e increase = increase t c s a n decrease = decrease f i double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain st/ sts = stitch/ stitches blo = back loop only … x = repeat instructions in the round bracket for the indicated number of times = number of stitches in each round/ row this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to alter distribute publish share or post sell and reproduce this pattern you can sell the finished products made from this pattern but please credit the pattern to the chloe box instructions body using green round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring
